titleStmt.title: The country-man's guide or plain directions for ordering. Curing. Breeding choice, use, and feeding. Of horses, cows, sheep, hoggs, &c. Adorn'd with sculptuers, shewing the proper places in the bodies of the said several beasts, where the said distempers do usually happen. Published for the publick good, by W.W.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Lee, stationer, over against the post-office in Lombard-street,

notesStmt.note: The words "ordering. ... Breeding" are gathered by a right brace on the title page; the words "choice, ... feeding." are gathered by a left brace.
With an index and errata at end of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: S. Lee, stationer, over against the post-office
